title: Dokotoo Womens Wrap V-Neck Empire Waist Dress Lantern Sleeve Ruched Side Slit Elegant Maxi Dress
description: *The material is lightwight so may be thin for cold weather. *Please check the size chart and choose carefully, please size down if necessary.
Semi formal dress features wrap v-neck, long lantern sleeve, empire waist, ruched design, smocked detail and solid color. It's elegant and flattering to show your charm.
With soft and lightweight material, this maxi dress can provide you with comfy and warm wearing experience. Good quality and nice fit.
This empire waist dress is easy to pair with necklace, shoes, heels, handbag and so on to make an eye-catching look.
Wearing the A-line dress is suitable for casual, semi formal and formal occasions like wedding guest, party, date, hanging out, homecoming, prom, cocktail, date, shopping or vacation as you like.
